mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (category_id, name, price, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{categoryId},#{name},#{price},#{description},#{image},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select s.*, c.name as categoryName from setmeal s left join category c on s.category_id = c.id
and name like concat('%', #{name})
and type = #{type}
order by update_time desc
